title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 195.13 - License revocation and suspension
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 195.13 - License revocation and suspension

State Regulations

Any person, firm, company, partnership, corporation or
organization licensed under article 6-D of the General Business Law which has
its license revoked or suspended by the Department of State shall be ineligible
to employ assistants to install, maintain or service security or fire alarm
systems for the period of the revocation or suspension. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
195.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
